home_icons.name: Vision
home_icons.description: To be the preferred community-based financial service provider.

home_icons.name: Mission
home_icons.description: To empower the members economically through saving mobilization, providing affordable credit, and prudent investment by applying transformative management styles.

home_icons.name: Core Values
home_icons.description: Accountability, Honesty, Integrity, Transparency, and Teamwork.

products.description: An all-purpose loan granted to all members individually or corporates to finance development projects
This loan granted to members to finance emergency needs e.g sickness, natural disasters, or accidents
This loan granted to members to finance education needs e.g tuition fees, books and related expenses
This loan product designed to finance trading activities. The loan shall be advanced to ongoing businesses only
This loan is granted for agricultural purposes aimed at promoting agriculture for food security, improved livelihoods, e.t.c
This loan is granted to Catholic Churches only through the Parish pastoral.

loanApplication: Return loan form for appraisal and approval
Pay loan insurance fund of 1% of approved loan
Start paying loan promptly after a Grace period of one month.
